OutlandGenes.XenoReproductionGeneTemplat.label: {0} reproduction
OutlandGenes.XenoReproductionGeneTemplat.description: Carriers of this gene either through egg laying or birth, specifically produce a {0} xenotype baby.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Does not affect forms of reproduction added by other mods.
If multiple of this type of gene is on a single pawn, it will choose one at random every time.
